timelineItems.text: Both teams are stroking it around, looking for an opening. #GERALG

timelineItems.name: annie ♛
timelineItems.text: Neuer is always giving me heart attacks #GER

timelineItems.name: BlackfishGirl
timelineItems.text: I love Neuer but sometimes his tendency to run out of the goal makes me slightly uncomfortable! #GER

timelineItems.name: ৫
timelineItems.text: Sloppiness of Mustafi. Lack of pace of Mertesacker. Hmmm. Where have I heard that before? #GER

timelineItems.name: Soren Romer
timelineItems.text: Mustafi is not good enough to playbfor #GER... We saw it against #USA and he's already shown it against #ALG. A rare fluke from Löw...

timelineItems.text: Twitter will explode if #ALG equalizes. But I don't see them doing any better than "just wide." #GER #ALGvsGER

timelineItems.name: Zain Malik™
timelineItems.text: #GER have never lost a World Cup penalty shootout. 4 shootouts: 18 penalties, 1 miss.

timelineItems.name: Grootman_Mzeke
timelineItems.text: I don't know if a exhausted & strained Germany team can beat France if they seal this victory.This match just bruised them physically. #GER
